description:
Carl`s Gallade is a member of the Super Pok√©mon Battles troupe. Ash Ketchum and Pikachu thought Luchabull was bullying Carl`s Snubbull and came to rescue it. Unfortunately it was just doing a rehearsal and Carl`s Snubbull got mad and bit Ash Ketchum on the arm after it realized that Ellade got injured. Nurse Joy (Kalos) bandaged up its leg and told it would take a few days to heal so it couldn`t perform during that time.
None of its moves were confirmed in the episode.
name: Ellade (Carl)
